output:
'
A tourist visa is a visa issued to people who intend to visit Botswana for recreational purposes, or for other short-term non work related purposes. It allows entry into Botswana for up to one (1) month and is extendable on justification. To obtain this visa, applicants must fill and submit Form 1 (Application for Visa) in person at an immigration office, Botswana embassy or consulate, and submit the required documents. The cost for a single entry for a period up to one (1) month is BWP 300.00 (US$30.00).
